page.title: 15BEAR FLAT SHOPPING AREA,BATH
page.content: In the {BEAR FLAT}Shopping Precinct there is a fish and chip shop which is especially popular with the local schoolchildren. The local pub is called the {BEAR HOTEL}which has a full-sized model of a polar bear above the entrance. A toy shop called { {BRIANS}sells jokes and games. The local garage sells and services B.M.W. cars and motorcycles. Other shops and amenities include a pet shop, a post office and a couple of small supermarkets. The Bear Flat is a very busy area which lies about one and a half miles north of Bath city centre. Because of the wide variety of shops it is hardly necessary to go into town.
